knowledge.title: DuckDuckGo — 30 Ways to Effortlessly Start a Conversation With A Guy
knowledge.content: Imagine you're at a party, spot a great guy across the room, but your nerves kick in and words vanish. What if a few simple tweaks—like a warm smile and bold eye contact—could turn that moment into an exciting chat? How to a conversation with a guy with confidence in these 30 science-backed tips.

knowledge.title: DuckDuckGo — Phrases for Greeting People in English - ThoughtCo
knowledge.content: Use formal greetings like 'Hello' or 'Good morning' when meeting people for the first time. Informal greetings like 'Hi' or 'What's up?' are great for friends and casual meetings. For leaving, saying 'Goodbye' or 'See you soon' depends on how formal you want to be.

knowledge.title: DuckDuckGo — 500 Formal and Informal Ways to say Hello - Work Wizardry
knowledge.content: Effective communication begins with a thoughtful greeting. In personal or professional communication, the power of a simple "hello" should never be underestimated. From formal to informal settings, finding how to say hi can set the tone for a successful interaction. In this blog post, we an extensive list of over 500 different ways to say hi, covering various contexts and styles .
